titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London in Common-Councell assembled. To the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in High Court of Parliament. With their answer to the said petition.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the Honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: On the disbandment of the army.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
